Text: American Express Corporate CardmembersIMAGE In light of the recent events we understand some Cardmembers may not be able to access their American Express Card account statements As an American ExpressR Corporate Cardmember you can access Check Your Bill a free online service to manage your American Express Card accounts Check Your Bill allows you to have convenient online access to your account at any time so you dont have to call or wait for an American Express Corporate Card or Corporate Purchasing Card monthly statement to arrive in the mail In addition you can also be set up to make payments for Corporate Card charges online andor by phone change your billing address and more resulting in saving you time and money Manage your Card accounts online with Check Your Bill todaycheckyourbillaexpemCORP Please check with your Company guidelines or Credit criteria to see if these features are applicable for you PS This email was sent to DON NRONCOM If you received this email at a different address this email message was forwarded If you do not wish to receive future email offers from American Express please hit the reply button and let us know by typing the word REMOVE and indicate this email address in the subject line Please visit the American Express Privacy Statement atprivacyaexpemCORP to set review or change preferences regarding the type of emails you want to receive Copyright American Express Company All Rights Reserved
